task.title: Edit Query Details
task.shortdesc: Edit a query's name, contents, and/or star setting.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on a query in the list and choose Edit details....
step.stepresult: This will open a Query Details dialog.

step.cmd: Click the star to the left of the query's name to set or unset Starred. Edit Name and Comments as desired, and click Ok.
step.stepresult: Updated details will be reflected in the query's Info.
